alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; San Jacinto; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 7:29AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL MONTGOMERY... SOUTHWESTERN SAN JACINTO AND SOUTHEASTERN WALKER COUNTIES THROUGH 815 AM CDT... At 729 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Waverly, or 9 miles southeast of Huntsville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Conroe, southeastern Huntsville, Willis, Panorama Village, Cut And Shoot, New Waverly, Huntsville State Park, and Evergreen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
